Package cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities

Class Entity

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.java.klima.pacman.entities.Entity
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Food, Moving
    public abstract class Entity
extends java.lang.Object
    Entity is an abstract class for all different types of entities in the game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Entity

        public Entity​(Handler handler,
              float x,
              float y)
        Constructor of abstract entity class always called by all entities present in game. It takes the game handler for having access to the game map and its elements, an x-coordinate and a y-coordinate, which are both absolute in pixels, rather than in map tiles.

        It also sets local variables, x and y-coordinates in map tiles and the bounding rectangle.

        Parameters:
        handler - game handler for accessing other elements of the game
        x - absolute x-coordinate in pixels
        y - absolute y-coordinate in pixels

    • Method Detail

      • checkCollisions

        protected Entity checkCollisions​(float xOff,
                                 float yOff)
        Checks if this entity collides with any other entity.
        Parameters:
        xOff - x-coordinate to be checked
        yOff - y-coordinate to be checked
        Returns:
        entity colliding with this entity, or null, if there aren't any collisions

      • notCollidable

        public boolean notCollidable()
